original_text: The king also said unto them, Take with you the servants of your lord, and cause Solomon my son to ride upon mine own mule, and bring him down to Gihon:
korean_text: 왕이 그들에게 이르되 너희는 너희 주의 신하들을 데리고 내 아들 솔로몬을 내 노새에 태우고 기혼으로 인도하여 내려가고

sentences.original_text: The king also said unto them
Take with you servants of your lord
to ride upon mine own mule
and bring him down to Gihon
